description: The Laurasia-class frigate which serves as an escort for the Vesalius, and later becomes the mothership of the captured Duel, Buster, and Blitz Gundams. The Laurasia class, ZAFT`s standard model of space warship, is armed with a battery of powerful cannons and can carry up to six mobile suits. The mobile suit deck on the ship`s underside can detach and function as a reentry-capable landing capsule.
name: Gamow
